name: Get Your Rap On!
description:
Warning: Cringey, amateur rapping ahead.

Have you ever wanted to join a rap battle? Whether to win or to lose, have you felt the itch to get your hands on a mic and roast the other person to oblivion? 

If so, have I got the game for you! 

Get Your Rap On is a game where you rap battle for computer equipment (that you already own, but must keep away from the hands of greedy thieves.)

You must face 3 people: Marie, Tamia, and Dawn in order to keep your stuff. You must pick between two great lines of rap and deliver them with such dominance that your enemies shake in their boots.

You can do it. You're an Outside Data Specialist. It's your job to rap battle in hopes of winning more equipment. I know you won't let the company down. 

Now go make us proud. 

Instructions in-game.

All art, programming, and story by me.

Fonts Used:
https://www.dafont.com/komika-text.font?l[]=10&l[]=1
https://www.dafont.com/rainbowbitch.font?l[]=10&l[]=
https://www.dafont.com/cirkus.font?l[]=10&l[]=1
